scripts.dev:backend: KZ_AUTH_DEV_BYPASS=false KZ_ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://localhost:5173 KZ_KUBECONFIG=${HOME}/.kube/config KZ_KUBE_CONTEXT=kind-kubezen KZ_AUTH_OIDC_ISSUER=http://localhost:8081/realms/kubezen KZ_AUTH_OIDC_CLIENT_ID=kubezen-ui KZ_AUTH_OIDC_CLIENT_SECRET=z2WCvY1g0ydE1kkq8cASAXSgL2xu5jpk KZ_AUTH_OIDC_REDIRECT_URL=http://localhost:5173/auth/callback KZ_AUTH_OIDC_SCOPES=openid,profile,email go run ./cmd/server
scripts.dev:backend:bypass: KZ_AUTH_DEV_BYPASS=true KZ_ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://localhost:5173 KZ_KUBECONFIG=${HOME}/.kube/config KZ_KUBE_CONTEXT=kind-kubezen KZ_AUTH_OIDC_ISSUER=http://localhost:8081/realms/kubezen KZ_AUTH_OIDC_CLIENT_ID=kubezen-ui KZ_AUTH_OIDC_CLIENT_SECRET= KZ_AUTH_OIDC_REDIRECT_URL=http://localhost:5173/auth/callback KZ_AUTH_OIDC_SCOPES=openid,profile,email go run ./cmd/server
scripts.dev:all: sh -c "(KZ_AUTH_DEV_BYPASS=false KZ_ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://localhost:5173 KZ_KUBECONFIG=${HOME}/.kube/config KZ_KUBE_CONTEXT=kind-kubezen KZ_AUTH_OIDC_ISSUER=http://localhost:8081/realms/kubezen KZ_AUTH_OIDC_CLIENT_ID=kubezen-ui KZ_AUTH_OIDC_CLIENT_SECRET= KZ_AUTH_OIDC_REDIRECT_URL=http://localhost:5173/auth/callback KZ_AUTH_OIDC_SCOPES=openid,profile,email go run ./cmd/server) & (cd web && VITE_API_BASE=http://localhost:8080/api pnpm dev)"
scripts.dev:all:bypass: sh -c "(KZ_AUTH_DEV_BYPASS=true KZ_ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://localhost:5173 KZ_KUBECONFIG=${HOME}/.kube/config KZ_KUBE_CONTEXT=kind-kubezen KZ_AUTH_OIDC_ISSUER=http://localhost:8081/realms/kubezen KZ_AUTH_OIDC_CLIENT_ID=kubezen-ui KZ_AUTH_OIDC_CLIENT_SECRET= KZ_AUTH_OIDC_REDIRECT_URL=http://localhost:5173/auth/callback KZ_AUTH_OIDC_SCOPES=openid,profile,email go run ./cmd/server) & (cd web && VITE_API_BASE=http://localhost:8080/api pnpm dev)"
